front.title: Structure of the IETF Administrative Support Activity (IASA)

abstract.t: This document describes the structure of the IETF Administrative Support Activity (IASA) as an IETF-controlled activity housed within the Internet Society (ISOC) legal umbrella. It defines the roles and responsibilities of the IETF Administrative Oversight Committee (IAOC), the IETF Administrative Director (IAD), and ISOC in the fiscal and administrative support of the IETF standards process. It also defines the membership and selection rules for the IAOC.
